How long does Mystique Femme EDP last?

The Mystique Femme EDP boasts a remarkable longevity, lasting up to 8-10 hours, ensuring you remain captivating throughout the day. Its high concentration of exquisite ingredients makes it one of the most enduring fragrances available.
